title: Santos Reis (Chapel of)
body:
It was located near the old hospital of Miseric√≥rdia, when it was installed in a building on the street known as Hospital Velho and later as Santo Antonio. It was donated in 1514 by King D. Manuel to the hospital of this city. With the same name, there is also a chapel in Quinta dos Reis, in the parish of Monte, built by Duarte Mendes de Vasconcelos in the year 1554.

## See Reis Magos (Chapels of).

Duarte Mendes de Vasconcelos: Ordered the construction of a chapel in Quinta dos Reis, in the parish of Monte, in the year 1554.

1514: Donation of the chapel to the city hospital by D. Manuel.
